EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Final Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Renewal Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Applicant_Salutation__c} {!Application__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c}
Final reminder
Time is running out. Your current membership certificate expires on {!TEXT(DAY(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c))} {!CASE(MONTH(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None")} {!TEXT(YEAR(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c))}.
To renew your membership, simply click on the following link to confirm your details, agree to the terms and conditions, and pay:
Renew
Once you’ve renewed and paid, your new certificate will be available on your member portal as soon as your current certificate expires.
If we do not receive payment by {!TEXT(DAY(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c))} {!CASE(MONTH(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None")} {!TEXT(YEAR(Application__c.Date_Renewed__c))}, your membership will expire and unfortunately you will have to reapply.
Your assessor will contact you during your new membership period to arrange your next assessment.
If you have any questions please refer to our ‘renewing your membership’ fact sheet. Alternatively, you can contact our member services team on 01403 800141 or help@rspcaassured.org.uk.
Yours sincerely
Membership services RSPCA Assured
